imdb.plot outline: "The Countdown to Country Music's Biggest Night" is a daily five-minute show that will be available at ABC.com beginning on November 4th through November 12th. Jake Owen returns for the second consecutive year to take fans behind the scenes of the events around Nashville and interviews with some of country music's biggest stars as they prepare for the 43rd Annual CMA Awards.
imdb.title: The 43rd Annual CMA Awards Countdown to Country Music's Biggest Night
akas: The 43rd Annual CMA Awards Countdown to Country Music's Biggest Night (United States)
plot: "The Countdown to Country Music's Biggest Night" is a daily five-minute show that will be available at ABC.com beginning on November 4th through November 12th. Jake Owen returns for the second consecutive year to take fans behind the scenes of the events around Nashville and interviews with some of country music's biggest stars as they prepare for the 43rd Annual CMA _Awards_ (qv).::ABC Digital Media Studio
